extends java.lang.Object

      • setRegisters

        public abstract void setRegisters(int register,
                                  java.lang.Object... values)
                           throws InvalidRegisterException
        Set the value of a sequence of registers
        Parameters:
        register - The initial register to affect
        values - The values to store
        Throws:
        InvalidRegisterException - Thrown if the sequence of registers to affect goes beyond the number of registers supported by the CPU core

      • getRegister

        public abstract <T> T getRegister(int number)
                           throws InvalidRegisterException
        Obtain the value of a given register
        Parameters:
        number - The number of the register to read
        Returns:
        The value stored in register(number)
        Throws:
        InvalidRegisterException - Thrown if number is not a valid register
